Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Generates board that contains BoardRows based on BoardNodes
    Version:
    16 November, 2018
    Author:
    Dmytro Sytnik (VanArman), Ahmed Romih (decarbonite)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description
      Board(int zombiesToSpawn, int score, int money)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int zombiesToSpawn,
             int score,
             int money)
        Default constructor Initializes model for 5x9 board
        Parameters:
        zombiesToSpawn - int number of zombies that would be randomly generated
        score - int initial score for the game (round)
        money - int initial amount of money

      • Board

        public Board(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> zombieScope,
             int score,
             int money)
        Default constructor with level builder functionality that initializes model for 5x9 board
        Parameters:
        zombieScope - Map where key is name of the zombie, value - number of zombies of this type to spawn
        score - int initial score for the game (round)
        money - int initial amount of money

    • Method Detail

      • getZombieLocation

        protected int[] getZombieLocation()
        Gets all zombies locations on the board. Even indices of the array represent x location of zombies, odd are y; [1,2,5,4] means zombie at (1,2) and another at (5,4)
        Returns:
        int array of generated zombie locations

      • hasWon

        public boolean hasWon()
        Checks if player won the game
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, true for win

      • hasLost

        public boolean hasLost()
        Checks if player lost the game
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, true for loss

      • fightPlantZombie

        private void fightPlantZombie()
        Simulates fight between Zombies and Plants on each row and if Plant kill Zombie add point to the player

      • incrementMoney

        private void incrementMoney()
        Increment money if at least one of the rows contains MoneyFlower (if more, values added)

      • moveZombies

        private void moveZombies()
        Move Zombies across board in each row

      • runBoard

        public void runBoard()
        Main method that runs the Zombie generation, simulates fight method, moves zombies across board and prints board.

      • generateZombieSpawn

        protected void generateZombieSpawn()
        Randomly generates zombies' spawn location on the board

        public Plant addPlant(int x,
                      int y,
                      Plant plant)
        Adds Plant object on a specific coordinate
        Parameters:
        x - int column index
        y - int row index
        plant - Plant object
        Returns:
        Plant returns the plant if it was added, null otherwise

      • addZombie

        public boolean addZombie(int x,
                         int y,
                         Zombie zombie)
        Adds Zombie object on a specific coordinate
        Parameters:
        x - int row index
        y - int column index
        zombie - Zombie object
        Returns:
        boolean true if zombie added; false - otherwise
